Cramster is now Chegg Homework Help. Learn More Operating Systems Anonymous asked A fast food restaurant has four kinds of employees: (1) order takers, who take customers' orders; (2) cooks, who prepare the food; (3) packaging specialists, who stuff the food into bags; and (4) cashiers, who give the bags to customers and take their money. Each employee can be regarded as a communicating sequential process. What form of interprocess communication do they use? Relate this model to processes in UNIX. Answers (0) There are no answers to this question yet. Get homework help Ask a question About Chegg
